name: Case Closure Summary Report
query:
SELECT
    lc.case_number AS "Case Number:Link/Legal Case:120",
    lc.case_type AS "Case Type::100",
    lc.party_name AS "Party Name::150",
    lc.factory AS "Factory:Link/Company:120",
    lc.risk_level AS "Risk Level::100",
    lc.potential_liability AS "Liability:Currency:150",
    lc.assigned_leagal_officer AS "Legal Officer:Link/User:150",
    MAX(hl.hearing_date) AS "Last Hearing Date:Date:120",
    MAX(hl.outcome) AS "Final Outcome::200"
FROM `tabLegal Case` lc
LEFT JOIN `tabLegal Hearing Log` hl
    ON hl.parent = lc.name
WHERE
    lc.case_status = 'Closed'
GROUP BY lc.name
ORDER BY MAX(hl.hearing_date) DESC;
